header.name: Anu Shibin Joseph Raj
header.title: Lead Software Engineer
header.tagline: Building scalable, enterprise solutions with modern technologies
header.description: Full-Stack developer specializing in Java, ReactJS, Docker, and Microservices architecture. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable and maintainable software solutions for enterprise problems.

experience.description: Leading a team of 8 developers creating enterprise content management solutions
responsibilities: Architected and implemented microservices-based platform that improved scalability by 200%
Led migration from monolith to microservices using Spring Boot and Docker
Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 75%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure quality standards

experience.description: Developed full-stack applications for finance and healthcare industries
responsibilities: Built real-time data processing system using Java and Kafka handling 10M+ events daily
Developed responsive frontend using React and Redux improving user engagement by 30%
Implemented automated testing strategies increasing code coverage to 85%
Optimized database queries reducing response times by 60%

experience.description: Worked on various web and mobile applications
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Framework for mobile applications
Created frontend interfaces with React for customer-facing applications
Participated in Agile development process with bi-weekly sprints
Integrated third-party services and APIs into existing applications
